definition: to change at once on seeing sth different (idiom); loving fads and novelty/never satisfied with what one has
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
different/other/hetero-/unusual/strange/surprising/to distinguish/to separate/to discriminate
to think/to consider
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: I am weary of your changing.
sentences.chinese: 我厭倦了你的見異思遷。

sentences.english: Blizzard is freakish , it is to acquire larger interest apparently.
sentences.chinese: 暴雪見異思遷，顯然是爲了獲得更大的利益。

sentences.english: He is always changing his mind.
He is not a one-woman kinda man.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個見異思遷的人。

sentences.english: I don ' t think he can go far.
sentences.chinese: 他是個見異思遷的人，我認爲他不會有什麼出息。

sentences.english: He is a half-hearted man, i don't think he will be successed.
sentences.chinese: 他是個見異思遷的人，我想他不會有多大出息。
